contentList.content: As part of the bonus action you take to enter your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="RAGE">Rage</LSTag>, you can move up to half your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">speed</LSTag>. You can <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Jump">Jump</LSTag> once this turn without consuming an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
